template.description: A string template that can contain `%s`, `%d` and similar placeholders

inputPaths.description: An array of strings - the values of which should be '.' delimited paths pointing to values on the Tymly context. These context values will be combined as per the `template` to return the output string. See [vsprintf](https://github.com/alexei/sprintf.js#javascript-vsprintf) for more info.
